lines.text: You're gonna have WHAT cut off??
I am having a transsexual operation.
and that means-(makes a throat slashing motion)? I allways knew you were weird, Hollis, but this is sick! Sick and weird!
I'd try to explain it to you, but I know it wouldnt do any good.
You dress like a woman. You're begining to look and sound like a woman. I guess its alright if you want to pretend you're a woman...But having your DONG cut off??
